definition: a light leap by a horse in which both hind legs leave the ground before the forelegs come down, to perform a leap where both hind legs come off the ground, of a horse
details:
noun
- a light leap by a horse in which both hind legs leave the ground before the forelegs come down
= synonyms: vaulting
verb
- to perform a leap where both hind legs come off the ground, of a horse
= example: to perform a leap where both hind legs come off the ground, of a horse
